q1: Definitely over performed at the recent world cup!
a1: I think they lived up to the hype
q3: But mexico does it the best.
a4: Too bad they couldn't get over the 5th round "curse".
q5: With Mexico being one of the hosts for the 2026 games, do you think they have a chance of winning then?
a5: I think it'll be very difficult for a team from South America to win a world cup. Many players are going to Europe at a very early age.
